title: Highlighter: Integration of LUCENE-4133 (Part of LUCENE-3440)
description:
This patch integrates a weight-based approach for sorting highlighted fragments. 

See LUCENE-4133 (Part of LUCENE-3440). 

This patch contains: 


	Introduction of class WeightedFragListBuilder, a implementation of SolrFragListBuilder
	Updated example-configuration

comments.author: Koji Sekiguchi
comments.content: Patch looks good! Will commit soon.

comments.author: Koji Sekiguchi
